- Brief description of changes

## Checklist

- [ ] I have run `pnpm check` locally (type-check, lint, format)
- [ ] I have run `pnpm test` and tests pass locally
- [ ] I have updated `CHANGELOG.md` if this changes user-facing behaviour
- [ ] CI workflows pass on GitHub Actions
- [ ] When adding dependencies, confirm package names and license

## Notes for reviewer

- If this PR adds `grepilte` or `coderabbit`, verify exact package names and preferred placement (`dependencies` vs `devDependencies`).
